attributes.action: reveal the full extent of EU involvement in the closure of the Post Offices and if David Milliband received a letter in November 2007 asking him to close around 2500 post offices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to some sources David Milliband received a letter in 2007 asking him to close around 2500 Post Offices. Is this true and what other interference in the business of the Post Office / Royal Mail is occuring?
